mapper.update:
update buss_category_
update_time_ = #{updateTime},
comm_ = #{comm},
cate_name_ = #{cateName},
create_time_ = #{createTime},
manu_num_ = #{manuNum},
create_user_ = #{createUser},
offer_aging_ = #{offerAging},
offer_pri_ = #{offerPri},
prod_pla_ = #{prodPla},
cate_stan_ = #{cateStan},
pkg_quan_ = #{pkgQuan},
cate_pic_ = #{catePic},
update_user_ = #{updateUser},
where category_id_ = #{categoryId}
mapper.select: select c.category_id_ , c.cate_name_, c.manu_num_, c.prod_pla_, c.cate_stan_ , c.pkg_quan_ from buss_rel_customer_category_ a LEFT JOIN buss_customer_ b on a.customer_id_ = b.customer_id_ LEFT JOIN buss_category_ c on a.category_id_ = c.category_id_ where b.customer_id_ = #{0}

select b.category_id_ , b.cate_name_, b.cate_stan_, b.manu_num_, b.prod_pla_, b.pkg_quan_, c.wholesale_pri_, c.acpt_pri_ from buss_rel_customer_category_ a left join buss_category_ b on a.category_id_ = b.category_id_ left join buss_rel_category_price_ c on b.category_id_ = c.category_id_ where a.create_user_ = #{createUser } order by c.wholesale_pri_ DESC

select b.category_id_ , b.cate_name_, b.cate_stan_, b.manu_num_, b.prod_pla_, b.pkg_quan_, c.wholesale_pri_, c.acpt_pri_, c.spot_min_, c.spot_max_ , c.fut_min_, c.fut_max_, c.inter_fut_min_, c.inter_fut_max_ from buss_rel_customer_category_ a left join buss_category_ b on a.category_id_ = b.category_id_ left join buss_rel_category_price_ c on b.category_id_ = c.category_id_ where a.create_user_ in ( select a.member_id_ from sys_member_ a LEFT JOIN sys_member_ b on a.dept_id_ = b.dept_id_ where b.member_id_ = #{createUser } ) order by c.wholesale_pri_ DESC

select b.category_id_ , b.cate_name_, b.cate_stan_, b.manu_num_, b.prod_pla_, b.pkg_quan_, a.cate_sup_ , a.currency_, a.unit_, b.offer_pri_ from buss_category_ b LEFT JOIN buss_rel_category_price_ a on a.category_id_ = b.category_id_ WHERE ISNULL(b.offer_pri_)

select b.category_id_ , b.cate_name_, b.cate_stan_, b.manu_num_, b.prod_pla_, b.pkg_quan_, a.cate_sup_ , a.currency_, a.unit_, b.offer_pri_, a.cate_pri_, a.offer_aging_, cus_cha_val_ from buss_category_ b LEFT JOIN buss_rel_category_price_ a on a.category_id_ = b.category_id_ WHERE b.offer_pri_ != ''

select a.cate_pic_, d.user_name_, c.cus_name_, c.cus_type_, c.cus_cha_, c.cus_loc_ from buss_category_ a LEFT JOIN buss_rel_customer_category_ b on a.category_id_ = b.category_id_ and a.create_user_ = b.create_user_ LEFT JOIN buss_customer_ c on b.customer_id_ = c.customer_id_ LEFT JOIN sys_user_ d on d.user_id_ = a.create_user_ where a.category_id_ = #{0}

select c.category_id_ , c.cate_name_, c.manu_num_, c.prod_pla_, c.cate_stan_ , c.pkg_quan_ from buss_rel_customer_category_ a LEFT JOIN buss_customer_ b on a.customer_id_ = b.customer_id_ LEFT JOIN buss_category_ c on a.category_id_ = c.category_id_ where b.customer_id_ = #{0} and c.offer_pri_ != '' or c.offer_pri_ >0
